content: Unless you want to make $100k on Twitter please swipe to left!This is an NFT project needs promoting on Twitter and Twitter only!Can we afford to pay you $1 before mint NO! AGAIN NO!Are you planning to partner and give us a shitty worth nothing partnership swipe to left!This is very unique structure project that just needs word to be out! Can we pay you upfront anything again NO!If you trust your work, your " network", and you can let them hold until we mint out AND BUZZ THE HECK OUT OF THIS PROJECT..Can you make $100k Yes.We are on Telegram @mnc2021

Can we pay you upfront anything again NO!If you trust your work, your " network", and you can let them hold until we mint out AND BUZZ THE HECK OUT OF THIS PROJECT..Can you make $100k Yes.We are on Telegram @mnc2021I expected you to shade some light about the work description as well as payment duration (eg $100 for 7days, 14days or 30 days. Also, are you paying in stablecoin or the native token of the project? What is the target number of followers one must have?

comments.author: Durdenkingtyler
comments.body: Quote from: someoneontwitter on June 22, 2022, 01:24:33 PMUnless you want to make $100k on Twitter please swipe to left!This is an NFT project needs promoting on Twitter and Twitter only!Can we afford to pay you $1 before mint NO! AGAIN NO!Are you planning to partner and give us a shitty worth nothing partnership swipe to left!This is very unique structure project that just needs word to be out! Can we pay you upfront anything again NO!If you trust your work, your " network", and you can let them hold until we mint out AND BUZZ THE HECK OUT OF THIS PROJECT..Can you make $100k Yes.We are on Telegram @mnc2021It sounds incredible likely that you are going to fraud the people who would potentially work for you. The project is most likely going to fail, you are not going to sell out your project and you will kick out your partner and give him nothing.Why would anyone want to work with you with no promises of ever getting paid? Obviously I could do the same as you and say that I wanted to launch a NFT project and if I sold for 1 million I would give the promoter 100k. But you really think any decent promoter would take a offer like that? Hell no.

comments.author: Iadegbola34
comments.body: Quote from: someoneontwitter on June 22, 2022, 01:24:33 PMUnless you want to make $100k on Twitter please swipe to left!This is an NFT project needs promoting on Twitter and Twitter only!Can we afford to pay you $1 before mint NO! AGAIN NO!Are you planning to partner and give us a shitty worth nothing partnership swipe to left!This is very unique structure project that just needs word to be out! Can we pay you upfront anything again NO!If you trust your work, your " network", and you can let them hold until we mint out AND BUZZ THE HECK OUT OF THIS PROJECT..Can you make $100k Yes.We are on Telegram @mnc2021Promotional services work on money and not some vague promises. A very good promoter will never accept to promote your project based on the terms you mentioned. If you genuinely want to promote your project, you should set aside money for marketing. It's as important as the project itself, if you want to make 100k$ then you pay an influencer capable of making you that much money.
